key_risks: Legal disputes including a securities class action lawsuit
Dependence on external factors like EV adoption rates
controversies: Securities class action lawsuit with a proposed $3.75 million settlement
Allegations from short-sellers about overstated charging network size
social_issues: Customer complaints regarding app functionality and charging station availability
governance_issues: Concerns about transparency and operational integrity
